Package commandLineApplication

Class Island

java.lang.Object
commandLineApplication.Island
public class Island
extends java.lang.Object
Island is either home or destination for a ship. There are 5 in total.
Each has a shop and 2 routes to each of the other islands.
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinnier-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Island

      public Island​(java.lang.String name, Store store)
      A constructor for an island object. Also creates an array list for possible routes from it.
      Parameters:
      name - Default by button, the name of the island
      store - Default, a specific store only on that island

  • Method Details

    • addRoute

      public void addRoute​(Route route)
      A method to add routes from a specific island to other islands in its route list
      Parameters:
      route - A specific way from one island to another with unique characteristics

    • getName

      Get an Island's name

    • getRoutes

      public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes​(Island destination)

      To view the property on the island

      To show the property of an island when calling it as an object
